metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15297 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: res_pjsip_t38 in Sangoma Asterisk 15.x before 15.7.4 and 16.x before 16.5.1 allows an attacker to trigger a crash by sending a declined stream in a response to a T.38 re-invite initiated by Asterisk. The crash occurs because of a NULL session media object dereference.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
